pullRequest.title: Add description to submit and get async search, as well as cancel tasks
pullRequest.bodyText:
This makes it easier to debug where such tasks come from in case they are returned from the get tasks API.
Also renamed the last occurrence of waitForCompletion to waitForCompletionTimeout in get async search request.

commit.message:
Add description to submit and get async search, as well as cancel tasks

This makes it easier to debug where such tasks come from in case they are returned from the get tasks API.

Also renamed the last occurrence of waitForCompletion to waitForCompletionTimeout in get async search request.
add tests and make submit description work
